body_html:
Hi @pjh5
Thanks for having a look at my build issue.

I do already have pytorch installed via conda. But I did make a new env to build caffe2.

I checked out a clean version of pytorch , switched to the v0.4.0 tag, did the "git submodule update --init --recursive" command then made a build dir,
cmake ..; sudo make install

and it results in
/home/brian/caffe2/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/defs/tensor/defs.cc:60:6: error: ‘class onnx_c2::OpSchema’ has no member named ‘ShapeInferenceFunction’ .ShapeInferenceFunction([](InferenceContext& ctx) { ^ /home/brian/caffe2/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/defs/tensor/defs.cc: In lambda function: /home/brian/caffe2/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/defs/tensor/defs.cc:61:48: error: ‘hasExactlyNInputTypes’ was not declared in this scope if (!hasExactlyNInputTypes(ctx, 1, "Cast")) {

I've attached a full log of the output
out.txt
body_text:
Hi @pjh5
Thanks for having a look at my build issue.
I do already have pytorch installed via conda. But I did make a new env to build caffe2.
I checked out a clean version of pytorch , switched to the v0.4.0 tag, did the  "git submodule update --init --recursive" command then made a build dir,
cmake ..; sudo make install
and it results in
/home/brian/caffe2/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/defs/tensor/defs.cc:60:6: error: ‘class onnx_c2::OpSchema’ has no member named ‘ShapeInferenceFunction’ .ShapeInferenceFunction([](InferenceContext& ctx) { ^ /home/brian/caffe2/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/defs/tensor/defs.cc: In lambda function: /home/brian/caffe2/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/defs/tensor/defs.cc:61:48: error: ‘hasExactlyNInputTypes’ was not declared in this scope if (!hasExactlyNInputTypes(ctx, 1, "Cast")) { 
I've attached a full log of the output
out.txt
body:
Hi @pjh5 
Thanks for having a look at my build issue.

I do already have pytorch installed via conda. But I did make a new env to build caffe2.

I checked out a clean version of pytorch , switched to the v0.4.0 tag, did the  "git submodule update --init --recursive" command then made a build dir,
`cmake ..; sudo make install`

and it results in
`/home/brian/caffe2/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/defs/tensor/defs.cc:60:6: error: ‘class onnx_c2::OpSchema’ has no member named ‘ShapeInferenceFunction’
     .ShapeInferenceFunction([](InferenceContext& ctx) {
      ^
/home/brian/caffe2/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/defs/tensor/defs.cc: In lambda function:
/home/brian/caffe2/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/defs/tensor/defs.cc:61:48: error: ‘hasExactlyNInputTypes’ was not declared in this scope
       if (!hasExactlyNInputTypes(ctx, 1, "Cast")) {
`

I've attached a full log of the output
[out.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/2078381/out.txt)
